name.description: Name of filter applied or to be applied. If more than one filter input as a comma separated list.
name.title: name

type.description: Type of filter, must be one of the available filters.
type.title: type

units_in.description: Name of the input units to the filter. Should be all lowercase and separated with an underscore, use 'per' if units are divided and '-' if units are multiplied.
units_in.title: units_in

units_out.description: Name of the output units.  Should be all lowercase and separated with an underscore, use 'per' if units are divided and '-' if units are multiplied.
units_out.title: units_out

calibration_date.description: Most recent date of filter calibration in ISO format of YYY-MM-DD.
calibration_date.title: calibration_date

gain.description: scalar gain of the filter across all frequencies, producted with any frequency depenendent terms
gain.title: gain
